website_summaries.verdict: Hartz is a brand that has been trusted for decades for providing quality pet products that are also affordable, so you can feel confident feeding your pet this wholesome guinea pig diet.
pros: Nutritionally-fortified pellets that are made with omega 3 and 6 fatty acids and antioxidants
Most piggies like the crunchy texture, and many owners report that their pets "clean their bowls."
Comes in a generously-sized bag for an affordable price
cons: Pellets vary in size, and some guinea pigs tend to avoid the larger pieces
Some bags may contain more dust than others due to broken pieces

customer_reviews.title: Different Product Than Pictured
customer_reviews.text: My most recent order of this product was not what I usually recieve. The pellets are different sizes, some of them are even too big for a guinea pigs mouth. There are strange yellow bits that the previous bags did not have. I will update this review if my guinea pigs still enjoy eating them but as for now, they don't seem to be interested like the previous times I've ordered. Did Hartz change their product? I would really like to get a reply from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this product from Amazon for my three guinea pigs, and they used to love it. Now it's a different formulation and is made up of different sized pellets, unlike what is shown in the picture. My guinea pigs don't like the fat little pellets (that weren't there in my previous orders of this product) and spill them out all over the cage, then they get pee and drops of water from their bottles on them, and they make a huge mess. I won't be buying this product anymore - the quality has declined.
customer_reviews.author: EHasNoTimeThusShopsOnline

customer_reviews.title: Pellets for breakfast, lunch & dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Our guinea pigs wrote an extensive product review, but then they ate it by accident during breakfast. I think they enjoyed the pellets though.
customer_reviews.author: Wiccandolin

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for our guinea pig.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this one because my guinea pig was getting really picky with his food. Tried several grocery store ones & high end one from pet store (price was close to $20). Really big bag for the price. My pet is slowly eating it so seems so far so good. Would be nice if this had zip close at the top. Luckily I had this container from this other food that i used instead. Very little dust in the food-some brands have alot of pellet dust at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Trish2013

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs on food strike!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Hartz pet products for decades. This recently purchased bag of guinea pig pellets was weird. As seen in the photo, the small green pellets are normal g.p. pellets, while the large darker green pellets are not and my 3 g.p.s will not eat them. The Hartz customer service person I contacted via email forwarded my report to their quality control department and sent me a coupon to purchase another Hartz product. Will update if I actually hear from them, in the meantime will buy at local feed mill.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Margy

customer_reviews.title: Different than pictured, guinea pigs hated it
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers, the feed I got had three different sizes of pellets in it, not what is pictured. The largest pellets were too big for my three guineas to eat and they wouldn't try, the smallest yellow pellets disgusted them on a deep level, and the medium (regular) sized pellets they would pick out of the food and eat. As a result, the cage was a mess of uneaten large and tiny pellets and my pigs were always begging for more food because they'd only eat a third of what I gave them. These aren't picky animals, so Hartz is doing something really wrong here if this is what they think makes good guinea pig food.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: This food arrived yesterday and I fed to my 3 Guinea Pigs. Today they were refusing fresh veggies so I knew something was wrong. I found white larva making webs throughout the food! Last year I ordered a very large bag and had the same issue. Some of the pics are where I have containers that I clean and reuse, that's why it's in a different package. Disgusting!! Never again!! $10 food is not worth your pets lives or even the Vet bill this food will create!!
customer_reviews.author: c.brown

customer_reviews.title: Pig WILL NOT eat!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this for my guinea pig several times and he has always eaten it, except for this time. It has big pieces in it as well as small ones and my piggie will NOT eat the big pieces!! Always before there would only be a few of the big pieces in it but this time it's almost all big pieces. I have to pick out the big pieces and he still isn't eating it very good. Honestly the big pieces are better suited for a rabbit, not a guinea pig. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Larger pellets mixed in
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try a different Guinea pig food to change it up for our little guys. They seem to actually eat this quicker than the Oxbow brand. However quality control seems to be lacking. There are a lot of larger pellets in with the tiny ones and the piggies don’t even try to eat those. So I end up with a bottom of larger pellets that I just throw away. Hopefully this will get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value!
customer_reviews.text: My pigs love this stuff! I used to feed them Oxbow, because that's what my vet told me to get, but when I asked my boyfriend to go to a local pet store to pick up some food, I forgot to specify which food, so he just got the most inexpensive stuff he could find with the most food in the bag (this). My pigs get super excited about this even more so than when I fed them Oxbow, which one of my pigs actually seemed to dislike. Overall, this is a fantastic value and a lot of food (between my three, full-grown boars, it lasts me a solid 3-4 weeks) and everyone is satisfied, especially my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good until it changed recently.
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs used to love this product, but the most recent bag I ordered is a different mixture even the the details page has not been updated. The new bag has large pellets, small pellets, and colored small pieces. My guinea pigs won't touch the large pellets or colored pieces so most of the bag has been wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: More than one customer has complained about the pellet size. Guinea pigs won’t eat the large pellets, therefore the value for the price isn’t great. If my GPs can’t eat half the bag of pellets, that’s a waste. I won’t purchase this again until Hartz reformulates and makes pellets a proper size for piggies.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Too big for guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: This food is way too big for guinea pigs. It seems fresh and may work for a larger animal but my full grown guinea pigs try to get it in their mouth and end up spilling it all the cage rather than eating it. Unfortunately the smaller brands are much more expensive but it's better than them not being able to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different product
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for roughly a year and it has always been the same and my guinea pigs loved it but since my most recent purchase I have noticed that it has different kinds of pellets which my guinea pigs will not eat. My guinea pigs will go through their food and pick out the normal small pellets and leave the large ones so I have wasted nearly half a bag due to the fact that they refuse to eat the large pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: I feed this regularly to my guinea pigs. They don't seem to like the bigger, thicker pieces as much as the smaller ones. It's last my two a little over two months and it's a more reasonable price than most brands.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before
customer_reviews.text: I recently got the 2nd bag of this food.. problem is the same as some previous reviewers... its different than what I ordered before. They dont eat the big chunks of pellets in this feed or the little yellow pieces. Im a little annoyed that the picture doesnt match what im getting, its very misleading. Ill be getting a different food now since my guinea pigs wont eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Maulfair

customer_reviews.title: Good to mix with a variety pack
customer_reviews.text: I like this to add into a variety mix food to stretch the food to last. Seems like good quality and it is a good value. I don’t think it would be a good substitute on its own compared to the variety mixes
customer_reviews.author: JMMM

customer_reviews.title: Our pigs love this!
customer_reviews.text: These pellets are the best value for price that I found on the Internet. They’re way cheaper than buying it in stores.Since my daughter has to By all of her own piggy supplies this food makes it affordable for her. I’m very thankful she can enjoy her sweet pigs and afford them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Pigs did not eat the large pellets
customer_reviews.text: My pigs refused to eat the large pellets. They eat around them and i have to throw it away and give them more. Waste of money since I'm throwing half of the pellets away. Definitely wont be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs didn’t like
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know Guinea pigs would be picky eaters! They would eat the smaller pellets and would not touch the larger funky colored pellets. There was also some off yellow things they wouldn’t touch.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: No need to get the favor looking kind. They really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried that my spoiled guinea pigs would turn their noses up to this cause I used to always but the kids with all the different colors and shaped pieces. But they literally don't care and this price is great.
customer_reviews.author: The Kid's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the size variance in these pellets. There are small and large pellets as well as a lot of dust. My 8 piggies all hate the large pellets. They are too large for a guinea pig. I ended up with about half of this product just being wasted. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I ordered in January 2017 was great. The 2nd bag I ordered on May 28,2017 was horrible and not the same as advertised. The pellets are too big and my guinea pig won't eat them. The big pellets are meant for rabbits. Other reviewers posted the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig is picky, so he won't eat the larger chunks of pellet in this bag - but that's on him, not on this brand/product. Great price for the quantity of product received!
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: My little pigs aren’t a fan :/
customer_reviews.text: My little pigs aren’t a fan of this food they just pick out certain pieces and don’t eat stopped buying and switched to a different brand and they are eating better.
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Best Guinea Pig food we have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, it's cheaper than the choices at the local pet shop with shipping. The Piggies love it, and we have tried quite a few brands until we got to this one. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Has some yellow bits and huge bits
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs refuse to eat the yellow bits for some reason and it makes up for at least 15% of the entire thing. Not sure why they avoid it but I'm gonna assume they aren't very good. That and there are some really big pieces that they avoid as well, probably because its hard to chew. Other than that they seem to like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Vannie Williams

customer_reviews.title: There were big kibbles in this that my piggies wouldn't eat.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my guinea pigs and they only like the small kibbles. This had bigger kibbles in with the regular ones, for some unknown reason. Thankfully my goat liked them, so it wasn't a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Never thought a pig would be picky...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and listen to them. I read them and figure it would be alright, nope. The pig doesn’t like this stuff especially the large ones....exactly like all the reviews state.
customer_reviews.author: Moto

customer_reviews.title: Hartz Guinea Pig food
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's guinea pig Diego loves it! He also no longer has dry patches in his skin. I was truly impressed with the results since we switched him to this brand. Best part of it? It is delivered to the door and the price is the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: so I have been looking for a good option that is just straight up pellets
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs dig through their food trying to find the "candies", so I have been looking for a good option that is just straight up pellets. This works well! It took them awhile to realize there was no point digging this out all over the place, but they eventually figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Freridge

customer_reviews.title: Has several large pellets mixed throughout it that my guinea pigs won't eat.
customer_reviews.text: Last bag I bought was nothing like the bag I originally purchased, and has several big pellets mixed in that my Guinea pigs won't touch. I've Ended up throwing over half of ever bowl away. Am switching to a different brand. Was a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pig
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea Pig loves this and believe me she is very picky, Ive gone through so many brands that she just wont eat.
customer_reviews.author: veronica dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Best value for quantity
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value for quantity I've found! Mix it with some guinea pig treats (to encourage their foraging instincts) and youre good to go!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sparky likes it, his owner likes the price--but I'm forced to toss the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Sparky likes this inexpensive food more than any other pellets I've offered him. Just one problem: at 4 months away from his 3rd birthday, he's lost an alarming amount of weight and mobility. Too early to draw any cause-effect conclusions, but I'm taking him off of Hartz. It seems to have all the nutrients required by a GP, though I see no mention of Timothy hay as an ingredient in the pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: They mixed ingredients that are bad for Guinea pigs. Watch out if you don't want your pigs to get sick!
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Tukky

customer_reviews.title: My pet doesn’t eat
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is a waste of money. My guinea pig wouldn’t give a try, after several times I gave up. Wonder how am I going to deal with 10lb food.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Company changed the product...
customer_reviews.text: The mix of pellets has changed. They used to be all one size but now the pellets are all different sizes and it seems that they are different products. I used to stand by this product, but have been very disappointed with the past two purchases. My two guinea pigs won't touch the bigger pellets, so it's been wasted money. Currently looking for a new company to purchase from, if anybody has any suggestions!
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: It's Guinea Pig Food
customer_reviews.text: LARGE bag. Worth the price. As far as flavor goes....my pigs eat it? Sorry, not going to taste test myself, so you'll have to take the pigs word on that one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesoem
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I received this awhile ago, I just got the other two as well earlier than expected so very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. Great price. I’m not gonna review flavor or freshness cause I didn’t eat any of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Miller

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: guinea pigs heard the bag rattle and squeaking away and happy cause of there fresh pellets they were out of today.
customer_reviews.author: melissa rowe

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig does not like this. She prefers the kind from Walmart
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig does not like this. She prefers the kind from Walmart....of all places...Walmart is better than this if you ask her. I know because she wouldn't eat it except as a last resort, but the instant I got her the kind from Walmart again, she was super happy.
customer_reviews.author: JESS

customer_reviews.title: Dust
customer_reviews.text: Arrived like dust. I couldn’t even feed it to my piggies but luckily I was refunded
customer_reviews.author: DANNY

customer_reviews.title: Worth It.....
customer_reviews.text: I feel the pellets was worth it... and it's more for the money, then you might get at Walmart. My daughters little guinea pig seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: My shipment is always on time and my guineas seem to love the stuff (but mine aren't too picky so they eat almost everything I give). I like that it's a "bland" mixture without any extra stuff. I dislike that there's no reseal on it but a twisty-tie will always do. Overall a good, affordable buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nykemah

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review/ rating for this item. I've purchased this several times but the last bag I received is different. The pellets are of various sizes. Some crumbled really small with others extremely fat. Almost too big to be guinea pig pellets.
customer_reviews.author: snn

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious and good quality
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, my guinea pig loves this product and it helps keep his digestive tract normal. He's happy, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hintze

customer_reviews.title: My piggies were not fans.
customer_reviews.text: My piggies did not like this. There are three different sized pellets, and both my guys ate around all the large pellets and all the super small pellets. Not sure what the difference is, but they both certainly knew and did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Zub

customer_reviews.title: This was good when I only had two piggy lol I now ...
customer_reviews.text: This was good when I only had two piggy lol I now have six and order off chewy.com because I can go a 25 lb bag of oxbow for 32$
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is really great quality pet food
customer_reviews.text: Guineas love it, great quality, much more than I thought there'd be in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ankenman

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: When in a pinch it works just like the other name brand
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Idk about the flavor lol but my guinea pigs love it.
customer_reviews.author: amcyost15

customer_reviews.title: Came all broken up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four all where in the same box and game in crumbs not pelltes
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: 4 piggies, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I have four guineas and they love it! Even my picky eaters. 4/5 only because my picky eaters do not eat all of it and clearly have their favorite parts, but it’s not a lot of waste at all. I work at a pet store and have never seen a bag of pelleted diet this size for this price. Can’t be beaten. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valia Locklear

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The pig loves this and I don't have to run to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Redoy

customer_reviews.title: Piggy's gives it 100****
customer_reviews.text: My piggy's like it, they are happy, and have shiny nice coats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My g-pigs are picky and ate it all but took awile because they didnt want it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah2590

customer_reviews.title: Guineas love!
customer_reviews.text: Guineas love it! Some of the pellets are various sizes in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: madison reiheld

customer_reviews.title: Price Was Great Now Overcharging
customer_reviews.text: The amount of food and price was fabulous. Now sellers are overcharging.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvPrime

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces too large
customer_reviews.text: The pellets in this bag vary greatly by size and the large ones are too big for guinea pigs. I'll end up having 1/4 of the bag wasted
customer_reviews.author: Erica Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Decent food
customer_reviews.text: My little pigs love this brand. Gives them a Balanced diet. Size of bag/Quantity lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nutrition, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding my guinea pigs the much more expensive Oxbow pellets until I discovered this brand. When I made the switch, my piggies didn't even notice, and it appears to be just as nutritious for them. I am so glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rise

customer_reviews.title: GREAT deal on these
customer_reviews.text: GREAT deal on these! I used to be the more expensive pet store brand but our guinea pig actually liked these better. They are the best price for the amount you get that I researched online!
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: New formula. Bad switch.
customer_reviews.text: Like other purchasers, I received a new mix of food that the guinea pigs are ignoring. This was formerly a uniform bag of small pellets. I'll switch back if it returns to that formula.
customer_reviews.author: Soren Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Will be purchasing again. Great value and the pigs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, pigs love them
customer_reviews.text: My piggies love these as a compliment to their veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super value!
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pigs gobble this food up! And it's a super value considering that most brands are twice as much for the same exact food.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Quantity good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gives my Cavies all the vitamin C they need & they really like it
customer_reviews.author: TrashPanda

customer_reviews.title: Large pellets included that are too big for my guinea pig to eat
customer_reviews.text: The pellets included are all of different sizes. What I found disappointing that half of the bag has huge pellets that are too big for my guinea pig to eat. Also, a quarter of the pellets had been crushed and turned into particles/dust.
customer_reviews.author: Myungshrooms

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My niece comes and does chores to pay for this. We will be putting this on a continuous 1x mo. order as well as her bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: This accounts for about half of what it is made of so a lot is getting wasted. first time trying this brand but the only ...
customer_reviews.text: This food has different sized pellets in it. The small orange ones and the very large pellets my g pigs refuse to eat. This accounts for about half of what it is made of so a lot is getting wasted.first time trying this brand but the only one my piggies won't eat all of. Will not order again even though it's a good price for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and food always dependable for our guinea pig!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: VERY Horrible quality. Very dusty. So not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Good food for your money.
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pig loved it.... even though it was a new food that I was trying out for the 1st time. He loved it right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but some guinea pigs may not like this.... (or just mine)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our two guinea pigs. I don't think they are picky eater, but I think they prefer other brands that I gave them before. If they have no other choice, they would eat, but this is not their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ai my me

customer_reviews.title: Feed this Regularly
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig likes all of the pieces except for the tiny orange ones. Probably just her! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Capra

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this a few times for our pig. She likes it and it's not full of weird treats she does not need. She seems to be doing well on it. We also feed her hay and veggies daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Crushed pellets, too much waste!
customer_reviews.text: Approximately a quarter of the food bag was full of crumbs/crushed pellets. Therefore a quarter of the bag was waste because my guinea pigs would not eat the crumbs. I was very disappointed with this purchase. In the past, this had not been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great deal and smelt fresh, wouldn’t know how it tasted lol but my Guinea pig eats it all and doesn’t seem to not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Brittney

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't seem to enjoy this brand as much
customer_reviews.text: The guinea eats these but much slower than Purina brands. He doesn't seem to enjoy this brand as much. A lot of the chunks were in powder form that is not eatable for the guinea
customer_reviews.author: Zany

customer_reviews.title: Great food. Nice to buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great basic food for guinea pigs and mine love it. I don't think it really covers all aspects of their diet so I supplement it with fresh vegetables several times a week and unlimited hay and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: very chalky, almost half the bag was just dust!
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this brand! Upon getting the bag the about half the bag was ground down into dust! Total waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: too big for chewing.
customer_reviews.text: Most of all this is good, but it contains a lot big clots that my GP do not eat at all. I suppose it is too big for her to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good, good
customer_reviews.text: My piggies love this. It gives their nutriens and there is a lot in a bag. It last quite a long time for my three piggies.
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Great deal too for ten pounds
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves it. As soon as a fresh serving is available he comes right after it. Great deal too for ten pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: 2 sizes- only one that guineas will eat.
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 sizes of pellets. My 3 guineas will not touch the bigger ones, but seem to enjoy the smaller ones. I’ll have to throw half (or more) of the bag away, so wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crums on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: They are good for my guinea pigs. But the bottom of the bag was crummbled up it crums.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pigs loved the food, however the package was cut open as if with a knife while being put into the box. Other than packaging this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lil T

customer_reviews.title: Issue with delivery
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this multiple times. First time it came damaged. Pellets of food were scattered in the box. Not sure what happened. Luckily I keep the food in a plastic container after opening the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this as a less-expensive alternative to my piggies' typical ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a less-expensive alternative to my piggies' typical food...they're picky little creatures, and they couldn't tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: That's like 1/3 to 1/2 the bag gone to waste
customer_reviews.text: Ordered multiple times, this last order the bag looks different and had big green pieces that my guinea pig did not eat. That's like 1/3 to 1/2 the bag gone to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Deathwing

customer_reviews.title: but they loved this cheaper and healthier option
customer_reviews.text: I usually give my pigs a more deluxe mix of food, but they loved this cheaper and healthier option!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: definitely great for the money. and my girls love it
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Good product great price
customer_reviews.text: I pay more for the same product when I get it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee Myatt

customer_reviews.title: They pig liked it, me, not as much.
customer_reviews.text: The guinea pig enjoys it but I was not happy with the large amount of powdered pellets, I understand that its inevitable but it was a LOT. The plastic on the bag is not very durable and was busted open, luckily I noticed before I spilled too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ttler

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Steve likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Our guinea pig, Steve, is mildly picky so I was pleased that he likes this food and it has a great price point!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stringer

customer_reviews.title: good food
customer_reviews.text: only problem is that my guinea pig does not like the big pieces.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: This is the first one she loves
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different brand, my guinea pig doesn't like them. This is the first one she loves!! I hope she can love it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ledia

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: The pigs love it but we found a kernel of corn in the packaging and gave it to our hamster.
customer_reviews.author: General2Anime

product_meta.title: Hartz Guinea Pig Small Animal Food Pellets
product_meta.description: Size:10lbHartz Small Animal Diet for Pet Guinea Pigs is a tasty and nutritious diet that your pet guinea pig will love. We carefully select our ingredients based on the food preferences of pet guinea pigs to maximize consumption and minimize waste, which help to provide complete nutrition. Hartz Small Animal Diet for Pet Guinea Pigs is specifically formulated to meet the nutritional needs of pet guinea pigs. Our diet provides optimal levels of protein, fat and fiber to help your pet guinea pig maintain a healthy weight and digestive system. To help your pet guinea pig thrive, we fortified our diet with antioxidant vitamin C, minerals and omega fatty acids: • Vitamin C helps support bone and tissue health. • Omega-3 fatty acids help support a healthy heart. • Omega-6 fatty acids help maintain healthy skin and a soft shiny coat. Feeding Instructions: Feed 1/8 to 1/4 cup in a clean bowl every day. Adjust amount as needed to maintain proper weight. Always provide clean, fresh water. Tips: For best results when introducing a new food, begin with a mixture of current and new food to allow time for your pet to adjust to the transition. Gradually increase the amount of new food for 7-10 days. Store in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: Scientifically-Formulated To Meet The Nutritional Needs Of Guinea Pigs, This Diet Contains Carefully Selected Ingredients That Taste Great And Are Also Good For Your Pet.
Diet Fortified With Vitamins, Antioxidants And Omega-6 Fatty Acids.
Helps To Maintain Optimum Health And Shiny Coats.
